title: folder changes
content: I use T-bird to access several IMAP accounts from gmail. I am currrently unable to delete, rename or create new subfolders. When I select those options in the context menu, nothing appears to happen. I tried uninstalling, rebooting and reinstalling T-bird, which found my accounts and my local folders, but still won't allow me to make folder changes. Any help appreciated.
creator: maytheschwartz

title: Mail Channels Quartine Digest
content: How can I opt out of the Mail Channels Quarantine Digest. I have tried to select what I want put into the Mail Channels Quarantine Digest and I find the process very difficult and frustrating. I object to some program deciding what I want to have quarantined. I did not ask to have this program installed on my system. If whoever maintains this program gets it to where I can with one or two mouse clicks put something in the digest it seems like a good idea. Until then please let me opt out of having it on my system. If that is not possible I will start using a different e-mail program.
creator: Feredkonersman

title: Some emails with graphic links don't work
content: Some emails with graphic links do not open the website in your browser. Instead, the cursor changes to a "zoom/unzoom" icon, and that's what it actually does, zooms and unzooms. I've found this with emails from different sources, both for .png and .jpg images. But those same emails when viewed in a web-based client, the graphic links work correctly as expected. What's up with Thunderbird? Platform: Win11 Home latest, Thunderbird 128.6.1esr (64-bit).
creator: trumpman

creator: first98

title: What does the extension ConfirmBeforeDelete need to work with Thunderbird 128+
content:
The extension ConfirmBeforeDelete is extremely useful. It has saved me not only from accidentally deleting messages, but also from dragging and moving folders when I didn't intend to.

I recently had to manually recover from deleting 20 messages in a search window after I had accidentally hit the delete key (while I thought my cursor was up in one of my search fields).

Really, that functionality should be a built-in feature in Thunderbird.

The latest version of ConfirmBeforeDelete is 1.9.3, released Nov. 20, 2023. Compatible with Thunderbird 115.*

What did that extension need to be compatible with Thunderbird 128+? In other words, what change(s) in Thunderbird broke it? Would the fix be something easy or will it require more significant changes?

I tried to contact the author last October (even offered to gather some donations), but have not heard back.

It looks like there was already at least one person interested in helping. Thread on github: 

  How to update for Thunderbird 128? How to update for Thunderbird 128?
creator: David_C

title: Visualizzazione riquadro del anteprima della mail
content: Buongiorno, ho dovuto reinstallare thunderbird dopo aver formattato il pc e di conseguenza ho perso la visualizzazione che avevo prima, sono riuscito in gran parte a far ritornare tutto come prima, l'unica cosa che non riesco a sistemare è la visualizzazione delle mail di tutte le cartelle, in una singola riga. Infatti per ogni mail ricevuta ho un rettangolo più largo con sopra indirizzo mail di chi mi ha scritto e sotto l'oggetto. Ho provato a diminure lo zoom ma nulla, come posso far tornare il tutto in una singola riga? Allego immagine presa dal web per quanto riguarda la visualizzazione che vorrei.
